name: ChristmasCountdown
0:
”Alexa, ask Christmas Countdown how many days are left until Christmas.”
”Alexa, ask Christmas Countdown for some Christmas cheer.”
”Alexa, open Christmas Countdown.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas countdown
des: Get excited for Christmas with Christmas Countdown! Receive a fascinating piece of Christmas trivia every day, or a festive surprise as Christmas gets even closer.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
